Package com.ninjaguild.dragoneggdrop.dragon

Class DragonTemplate

java.lang.Object
com.ninjaguild.dragoneggdrop.dragon.DragonTemplate
public class DragonTemplate
extends Object
Represents a template for a custom dragon to be spawned containing information about its name, the style of its boss bar, as well as the loot table used to generate its loot after it has been killed.
Author:
Parker Hawke - Choco

  • Constructor Details

    • DragonTemplate

      public DragonTemplate​(File file)
      Construct a new DragonTemplate object.
      Parameters:
      file - the file holding this template data

    • DragonTemplate

      public DragonTemplate​(String identifier, String name, org.bukkit.boss.BarStyle barStyle, org.bukkit.boss.BarColor barColour, DragonLootTable lootTable)
      Construct a new DragonTemplate object.
      Parameters:
      identifier - the name to identify this template
      name - the name of the dragon. Can be null
      barStyle - the style of the bar. Can be null
      barColour - the colour of the bar. Can be null
      lootTable - the dragon's loot table. Can be null

  • Method Details

    • getId

      public String getId()
      Get the string that identifies this template. If a file was passed as a parameter in the creation of this template, the file's name will be used as the identifier.
      Returns:
      the unique template identifier

    • getFile

      public File getFile()
      Get the file in the "dragons" folder that holds information for this dragon template.
      Returns:
      the dragon template file

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Get the name of the dragon.
      Returns:
      the dragon's name

    • getBarStyle

      public org.bukkit.boss.BarStyle getBarStyle()
      Get the style of the boss bar.
      Returns:
      the boss bar style

    • getBarColor

      public org.bukkit.boss.BarColor getBarColor()
      Get the colour of the boss bar.
      Returns:
      the boss bar colour

    • getLootTable

      public DragonLootTable getLootTable()
      Get the loot table used to generate the loot for this dragon once killed.
      Returns:
      the dragon loot table

    • getSpawnWeight

      public double getSpawnWeight()
      Get the weight of this dragon's spawn percentage.
      Returns:
      the spawn weight

    • getSpawnAnnouncement

      public List<String> getSpawnAnnouncement()
      Get the messages to be announced to all players when this template spawns.
      Returns:
      the spawn announcement

    • shouldAnnounceSpawn

      public boolean shouldAnnounceSpawn()
      Check whether this dragon's name should be announced as it spawns.
      Returns:
      true if it should be announced, false otherwise

    • getAttributes

      public Map<org.bukkit.attribute.Attribute,​Double> getAttributes()
      Get an immutable Map of all attributes and their values according to this template.
      Returns:
      the mapped attributes and values

    • getAttribute

      public double getAttribute​(org.bukkit.attribute.Attribute attribute)
      Get the value to be applied for a specific attribute. If the provided attribute value is not specified, -1 will be returned.
      Parameters:
      attribute - the attribute to check
      Returns:
      the value of the attribute, or -1 if non existent

    • hasAttribute

      public boolean hasAttribute​(org.bukkit.attribute.Attribute attribute)
      Check whether this template has specified an attribute's value.
      Parameters:
      attribute - the attribute to check
      Returns:
      true if defined. false otherwise

    • applyToBattle

      public void applyToBattle​(org.bukkit.entity.EnderDragon dragon, org.bukkit.boss.DragonBattle battle)
      Apply this templates data to an EnderDragonBattle object.
      Parameters:
      dragon - the dragon to modify
      battle - the battle to modify

    • register

      public static void register​(DragonTemplate template)
      Register a dragon template in order for it to be used when generating dragons in the respawn process.
      Parameters:
      template - the template to register

    • getById

      public static DragonTemplate getById​(String id)
      Get a template based on its id (see getId()). This search is case-sensitive.
      Parameters:
      id - the template's unique id
      Returns:
      the resulting template, or null if none exists

    • randomTemplate

      public static DragonTemplate randomTemplate()
      Get a weighted random dragon template pooled from all loaded templates.
      Returns:
      a random dragon template. null if none
      See Also:
      getAll()

    • getAll

      public static Collection<DragonTemplate> getAll()
      Get an unmodifiable collection of all registered dragon templates.
      Returns:
      all dragon templates

    • clear

      public static void clear()
      Clear all loaded dragon templates.

    • reload

      public static void reload()
      Load and parse all dragon template files from the "dragons" folder. This method implicitly invokes clear() before loading any other templates.

    • loadTemplates

      public static List<DragonTemplate> loadTemplates()
      Load and parse all DragonTemplate objects from the dragons folder.
      Returns:
      all parsed DragonTemplate objects
